response.overview: Rainforests face more threats than ever before, but remain the last stronghold for some truly astonishing animal families. Today we know rainforests are some of the most wondrous and important habitats on Earth. It is the richest habitat on earth, teeming with millions of dramatic plants and animals. From giant landscape gardeners to a whole family supported by a single leaf, there are surprises at every turn.
response.tagline: Rainforests face more threats than ever before, but remain the last stronghold for some truly astonishing animal families.
response.title: Rainforest Home
